<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Dr. Shrink | Transform Emotions Into Healing Melodies</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.4.0/css/all.min.css">
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Poppins:wght@300;400;500;600;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
    <style>
        /* ================================================= */
        /* ---        CSS for Dr. Shrink Website         --- */
        /* ================================================= */
        
        /* --- 2. CSS Variables (Theme Definition) --- */
        :root {
            /* Core Colors - Therapeutic Palette */
            --bg-color: #1A2A2D;
            --bg-color-secondary: #2C3E40;
            --bg-card: #223438;
            --text-color: #E0E7E9;
            --text-color-muted: #A8B2B5;
            --text-color-headings: #ffffff;
        
            /* Accent Colors */
            --healing-green: #2ecc71;
            --healing-green-dark: #27ae60;
            --calm-blue: #3498db;
            --calm-blue-dark: #2980b9;
            --accent-pink: #ff85a2;
            --accent-yellow: #FFD166;
            
            /* UI Elements */
            --link-color: var(--healing-green);
            --link-color-hover: #58d68d;
            --border-color: #3b5257;
            
            /* Fonts */
            --font-primary: 'Poppins', sans-serif;
            --font-secondary: 'Poppins', sans-serif;
        
            /* Spacing */
            --card-padding: 1.5rem;
            --section-padding: 3rem 1rem;
        }
        
        /* --- 3. Base & Typography --- */
        body {
            background-color: var(--bg-color);
            color: var(--text-color);
            font-family: var(--font-primary);
            font-weight: 400;
            line-height: 1.6;
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            overflow-x: hidden;
        }
        
        h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6 {
            font-family: var(--font-secondary);
            font-weight: 600;
            color: var(--text-color-headings);
            line-height: 1.3;
            margin: 0 0 1rem 0;
        }
        
        p {
            margin-bottom: 1rem;
            color: var(--text-color-muted);
        }
        
        a {
            color: var(--link-color);
            text-decoration: none;
            transition: color 0.2s ease;
        }
        
        a:hover {
            color: var(--link-color-hover);
        }
        
        /* --- 4. Hero Section --- */
        .hero {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--bg-color) 0%, #20363b 100%);
            padding: 5rem 1rem;
            text-align: center;
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
            border-bottom: 1px solid var(--border-color);
        }
        
        .hero-content {
            position: relative;
            z-index: 1;
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 0 auto;
        }
        
        .hero-title {
            font-size: 3.5rem;
            font-weight: 700;
            margin: 0 0 1rem;
            color: var(--text-color-headings);
            line-height: 1.2;
            text-align: center;
            text-shadow: 0 2px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
        }
        
        .hero-subtitle {
            font-size: 1.4rem;
            font-weight: 300;
            max-width: 800px;
            margin: 0 auto 2.5rem;
            color: var(--text-color-muted);
        }
        
        /* Keyframe for button pulse */
        @keyframes pulse-grow {
            0% { 
                transform: scale(1); 
                box-shadow: 0 0 0 0 rgba(46, 204, 113, 0.7); 
            }
            70% { 
                transform: scale(1.03); 
                box-shadow: 0 0 0 15px rgba(46, 204, 113, 0); 
            }
            100% { 
                transform: scale(1); 
                box-shadow: 0 0 0 0 rgba(46, 204, 113, 0); 
            }
        }
        
        .cta-button {
            display: inline-block;
            font-weight: 600;
            font-size: 1.25rem;
            padding: 1rem 2.5rem;
            border-radius: 50px;
            text-decoration: none;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            margin: 0.5rem;
        }
        
        .cta-button.primary {
            background-color: var(--healing-green);
            color: white !important;
            border: none;
            box-shadow: 0 8px 20px rgba(46, 204, 113, 0.3);
            animation: pulse-grow 2.5s infinite;
        }
        
        .cta-button.secondary {
            background-color: transparent;
            border: 2px solid var(--healing-green);
            color: var(--healing-green);
        }
        
        .cta-button.primary:hover {
            background-color: var(--healing-green-dark);
            transform: translateY(-3px);
            box-shadow: 0 12px 25px rgba(46, 204, 113, 0.4);
            animation-play-state: paused;
        }
        
        .cta-button.secondary:hover {
            background-color: rgba(46, 204, 113, 0.1);
            transform: translateY(-3px);
        }
        
        /* --- 5. Healing Journey Process --- */
        .journey-section {
            padding: 5rem 1rem;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #223438 0%, #1A2A2D 100%);
            position: relative;
        }
        
        .section-title {
            text-align: center;
            font-size: 2.2rem;
            margin-bottom: 3rem;
            color: var(--text-color-headings);
            font-weight: 600;
        }
        
        .journey-steps {
            display: flex;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            justify-content: center;
            gap: 30px;
            max-width: 1400px;
            margin: 0 auto;
        }
        
        .journey-step {
            flex: 1;
            min-width: 250px;
            max-width: 300px;
            background: var(--bg-card);
            border-radius: 20px;
            padding: 30px;
            text-align: center;
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
            box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
            transition: all 0.4s ease;
            z-index: 1;
        }
        
        .journey-step:hover {
            transform: translateY(-15px) scale(1.03);
            box-shadow: 0 20px 40px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
        }
        
        .step-number {
            position: absolute;
            top: 20px;
            left: 20px;
            width: 40px;
            height: 40px;
            background: var(--healing-green);
            color: white;
            border-radius: 50%;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            font-weight: bold;
            font-size: 1.2rem;
            z-index: 2;
        }
        
        .step-icon {
            font-size: 3.5rem;
            margin: 20px 0;
            color: var(--healing-green);
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }
        
        .journey-step:hover .step-icon {
            transform: scale(1.2);
            color: var(--accent-yellow);
        }
        
        .step-title {
            font-size: 1.6rem;
            margin: 20px 0 15px;
            color: var(--text-color-headings);
        }
        
        .step-content {
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            color: var(--text-color-muted);
        }
        
        .step-emotions {
            display: flex;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            justify-content: center;
            gap: 8px;
            margin-top: 15px;
        }
        
        .emotion-tag {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            padding: 5px 12px;
            border-radius: 20px;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
        }
        
        .step-highlight {
            background: rgba(255, 133, 162, 0.1);
            padding: 15px;
            border-radius: 10px;
            margin-top: 15px;
            border-left: 3px solid var(--accent-pink);
        }
        
        /* --- 6. Content Levels Section --- */
        .levels-section {
            padding: 5rem 1rem;
            background: var(--bg-color);
        }
        
        .levels-container {
            display: flex;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            gap: 30px;
            max-width: 1400px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            justify-content: center;
        }
        
        .content-level {
            flex: 1;
            min-width: 300px;
            max-width: 350px;
            background: var(--bg-card);
            border-radius: 20px;
            padding: 30px;
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
            box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
            transition: all 0.4s ease;
        }
        
        .content-level:hover {
            transform: translateY(-10px);
            box-shadow: 0 20px 40px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
        }
        
        .level-header {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            margin-bottom: 25px;
            padding-bottom: 15px;
            border-bottom: 1px solid var(--border-color);
        }
        
        .level-icon {
            font-size: 2.5rem;
            margin-right: 15px;
            width: 60px;
            height: 60px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
        }
        
        .level-1 .level-icon {
            background: rgba(52, 152, 219, 0.2);
            color: var(--calm-blue);
        }
        
        .level-2 .level-icon {
            background: rgba(46, 204, 113, 0.2);
            color: var(--healing-green);
        }
        
        .level-3 .level-icon {
            background: rgba(255, 133, 162, 0.2);
            color: var(--accent-pink);
        }
        
        .level-4 .level-icon {
            background: rgba(255, 209, 102, 0.2);
            color: var(--accent-yellow);
        }
        
        .level-title {
            font-size: 1.8rem;
            margin: 0;
        }
        
        .level-content {
            margin-bottom: 25px;
            color: var(--text-color-muted);
        }
        
        .level-cta {
            display: inline-block;
            padding: 10px 25px;
            border-radius: 30px;
            font-weight: 500;
            text-decoration: none;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }
        
        .level-1 .level-cta {
            background: var(--calm-blue);
            color: white;
        }
        
        .level-2 .level-cta {
            background: var(--healing-green);
            color: white;
        }
        
        .level-3 .level-cta {
            background: var(--accent-pink);
            color: white;
        }
        
        .level-4 .level-cta {
            background: var(--accent-yellow);
            color: #333;
        }
        
        /* --- 7. Features Section --- */
        .features {
            display: flex;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            justify-content: center;
            gap: 1.5rem;
            margin: 3rem auto;
            max-width: 1100px;
            padding: 0 1rem;
        }
        
        .feature {
            background-color: var(--bg-card);
            border-radius: 12px;
            padding: 2rem;
            width: 320px;
            text-align: center;
            border: 1px solid var(--border-color);
            transition: transform 0.2s ease, box-shadow 0.2s ease;
        }
        
        .feature:hover {
            transform: translateY(-5px);
            box-shadow: 0 8px 25px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);
            border-color: var(--healing-green);
        }
        
        .feature h3 {
            color: var(--text-color-headings);
            margin: 1rem 0 0.5rem 0;
            font-size: 1.5rem;
        }
        
        .feature p {
            color: var(--text-color-muted);
            margin-bottom: 0;
        }
        
        .feature-icon {
            font-size: 2.5rem;
            line-height: 1;
            color: var(--healing-green);
            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }
        
        /* --- 8. Testimonial Section --- */
        .testimonial-section {
            max-width: 800px;
            margin: 4rem auto;
            padding: var(--section-padding);
            background-color: var(--bg-card);
            border-radius: 12px;
        }
        
        .testimonial {
            font-style: italic;
            font-size: 1.2rem;
            color: var(--text-color);
            line-height: 1.7;
            text-align: center;
            border-left: 4px solid var(--healing-green);
            padding-left: 1.5rem;
        }
        
        .testimonial::after {
            content: attr(data-cite);
            display: block;
            font-style: normal;
            font-weight: 600;
            color: var(--text-color-muted);
            margin-top: 1rem;
            font-size: 1rem;
        }
        
        /* --- 9. Footer --- */
        footer {
            text-align: center;
            padding: 40px 20px;
            color: var(--text-color-muted);
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            background: var(--bg-color-secondary);
            border-top: 1px solid var(--border-color);
        }
        
        .social-links {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            gap: 20px;
            margin: 20px 0;
        }
        
        .social-link {
            width: 50px;
            height: 50px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            background: var(--bg-card);
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            color: var(--healing-green);
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }
        
        .social-link:hover {
            transform: translateY(-5px);
            background: var(--healing-green);
            color: white;
        }
        
        /* --- 10. Responsive Design --- */
        @media (max-width: 992px) {
            .hero-title {
                font-size: 2.8rem;
            }
            
            .journey-step {
                min-width: 45%;
            }
        }
        
        @media (max-width: 768px) {
            .hero-title {
                font-size: 2.3rem;
            }
            
            .hero-subtitle {
                font-size: 1.2rem;
            }
            
            .journey-steps {
                flex-direction: column;
                align-items: center;
            }
            
            .journey-step {
                min-width: 100%;
                max-width: 400px;
            }
            
            .levels-container {
                flex-direction: column;
                align-items: center;
            }
            
            .content-level {
                min-width: 100%;
                max-width: 500px;
            }
            
            .features {
                flex-direction: column;
                align-items: center;
            }
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>

    <script>
        // Simple animation for step icons
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            const steps = document.querySelectorAll('.journey-step');
            
            steps.forEach(step => {
                step.addEventListener('mouseenter', function() {
                    const icon = this.querySelector('.step-icon');
                    icon.style.transform = 'scale(1.2)';
                    icon.style.color = '#FFD166';
                });
                
                step.addEventListener('mouseleave', function() {
                    const icon = this.querySelector('.step-icon');
                    icon.style.transform = 'scale(1)';
                    icon.style.color = '#2ecc71';
                });
            });
        });
    </script>
